Name: Alexander
Description: This cocktail alexander recipe makes it all nice and creamy.

Name: Amaretto Sour
Description: For a change of pace, an Amaretto Sour is just the thing. The recipe with the extra kick!

Name: Americano
Description: A sweet cocktail is the Americano, which you can prepare quickly and easily with this recipe.

Name: Angel Blue-d
Description: With curaçao and vodka, the drink turns beautifully blue. The Angel Blue cocktail is a quaffable drink - not just for angels.

Name: Aperol Lillet-d
Description: The Aperol Lillet has only 3 ingredients, but you can always pimp the drink - here is the quick recipe.

Name: Aperol Sour-d
Description: A great summer drink is the Aperol Sour. This cocktail recipe is served with Ice Cubes and an Orange Slice in the glass.

Name: Apple Juice Soda Gin-d
Description: An apple juice soda gin is guaranteed to taste good in a cozy gathering. Serve the recipe with apple chips.

Name: Apricot Sunset-d
Description: Apricot Brandy and Sparkling Wine are the main ingredients to this cocktail that will make the sun rise in your heart with the Apricot Sunset.

Name: B-52
Description: The burning shooter with real Kahlua rum and Cointreau knocks out even the strongest guys. B-52 II is not for beginners!

Name: Bacardi
Description: A delightful cocktail recipe. The Bacardi cocktail should not be missing from any party.

Name: Bahama Mama
Description: A Bahama Mama is Fruity and tasty. Summer feeling is pre-programmed with this recipe. Let them seduce you!

Name: Bellini
Description: The centerpiece of the Bellini is the pureed peach piece. A classic cocktail with prosecco, reminiscent of dolce vita.

Name: Between The Sheets
Description: Between the Sheets doesn't skimp on alcohol. But it's the mix that makes a good cocktail. You can't go wrong with this recipe.

Name: Black Russian
Description: A cocktail that consists of only 2 ingredients and perhaps that's why it tastes so good is the Black Russian.

Name: Bloody Mary
Description: The American classic made with vodka and tomato juice remains one of the most famous cocktails around. Bloody Mary forever.

Name: Blue Hawaiian
Description: This cocktail is a mix of Pina Colada and Swimming Pool. A great recipe without the cream.

Name: Blue Lagoon
Description: The Blue Lagoon cocktail recipe is made with vodka and Blue Curacao, a popular drink because of its heavenly blue color.

Name: A.M.F
Description: If you've never had a blue motorcycle drink, it's kind of like a Long Island iced tea, but with a colorful twist!

Name: Blueberry Tea Cocktail
Description: The blueberry tea combines amaretto, orange liqueur, and hot orange pekoe tea, making this warm drink taste reminiscent of blueberries.

Name: Caipirinha
Description: The Caipirinha is a cult Brazilian drink made with Cachaca & Lime Juice. A refreshing drink that no party should be without.

Name: Caipirinha Strawberry-d
Description: The Caipirinha Strawberry recipe tastes deliciously Fruity and is an absolutely great cocktail for a casual gathering in the summer.

Name: Campari Fizz
Description: This Campari Fizz tastes super Spritzy and is a great recipe for many. The drink looks insanely good with an orange wedge.

Name: Campari Orange
Description: The Campari Orange is an erFreshing cocktail that is ideal as an aperitif for any summer party.

Name: Cape Cod
Description: The Cape Codder (or Cape Cod) is another name for the popular Vodka Cranberry, and it gets its name from the East Coast town in Massachusetts, which is known for growing cranberries. A simple mix of vodka and cranberry juice, poured tall in a glass and garnished with a lime wedge, it’s one of the easier-to-make cocktails you’ll come across. You don’t even have to shake it, strain it or employ any bar tools to make the Cape Codder.

Name: Captain Cola-d
Description: A wonderful Captain Cola always tastes good and goes well with any occasion. Besides, it is quick in preparation.

Name: Casanova
Description: Casanova cocktail recipe spreads summer feeling. A great recipe iced.

Name: Cosmopolitan
Description: A morn cocktail that also makes a wonderful aperitif is the Cosmopolitan.

Name: Cuba Libre
Description: The Cuba Libre is a classic among cocktails. The rum gives it an exotic flavor.

Name: Daiquiri
Description: The Daiquiri is a tropical rum cocktail from sunny Cuba and tastes deliciously Sweet.

Name: Dark 'N' Stormy
Description: This Dark and Stormy cocktail with lots of lime, rum and ginger ale, can only taste good - here is the recipe to follow.

Name: Martini
Description: A classic cocktail is the Martini Dry. The cocktail will give you that "James Bond" feeling.

Name: Electric Lemonade-d
Description: Electric lemonade just in time for summer... A sweet and tangy vodka drink perfect for outdoor gatherings.

Name: Espresso Martini
Description: An Espresso Martini is a classic cocktail with vodka, coffee liqueur and of course espresso. A great recipe!

Name: Flamingo-d
Description: The Flamingo is an exotic, non-alcoholic fruit cocktail that is also suitable as an aperitif at garden parties.

Name: French 75
Description: A sparkling, spritzy cocktail is the French 75. A delight for your palate is guaranteed.

Name: Frozen Margarita
Description: The Frozen Margarita is a tasty, slightly stronger cocktail that will delight all tequila fans.

Name: Frozen Strawberry Margarita-d
Description: A strawberry margarita is the perfect summer cocktail! Made with frozen strawberry and limeade concentrate, this five-ingredient margarita is ready to refresh you in just minutes. For an extra-sweet presentation, dip the rims of your margarita glasses in powdered sugar.

Name: Gin Fizz
Description: A gin fizz means pure party. Whether as a brilliant hot spot at birthday parties or glamorous evening for two. This recipe suits many occasions.

Name: Gin Tonic
Description: Gin tonic is great as an aperitif at your parties. This recipe is quick to prepare.

Name: Gluehwein
Description: Gluehwein (also spelled Glühwein) is a hot spiced 'glow wine' that's found in many winter markets in Germany and Austria. Many tourists know it as an after-ski drink. After you come in from being out in the cold and snow, this warm, spicy mulled drink is supposed to make you 'glow' with warmth again. Watch out — the alcohol in this warm beverage can quickly go to your head, so you might want to plan on staying in afterwards! This is the recipe my father would make for New Year's Eve.

Name: Grasshopper
Description: The Grasshopper is a sweet cocktail that gets a special flavor from different liqueurs.

Name: Grateful Dead Cocktail-d
Description: This Grateful Dead drink is considered the sweeter cousin of the Long Island Iced Tea. Like that drink, this cocktail packs a considerable punch!

Name: Whiskey Highball
Description: Horses Neck was a drink used by the British Navy. The cocktail has a slightly bitter but delicious taste.

Name: Hot Toddy
Description: This hot toddy is a great evening relaxer when you need something to help relieve that irritating cold.

Name: Hugo
Description: A Hugo is always welcome. Whether on balmy summer evenings or among friends. The recipe is slightly modified and prepared with Lime Juice.

Name: Hurricane
Description: The Hurricane is an exotic rum cocktail that is also a hit at any party as an aperitif.

Name: Irish Coffee
Description: An erFresh dessert - recipe for hot summer days is this Cold Irish Coffee.

Name: Kir Royal
Description: A Kir Royal is always a great and welcome drink. This recipe uses a red currant liqueur.

Name: Lime Daiquiri
Description: An exotic, tart cocktail is the Lime Daiquiri, which tastes simply delicious and will delight you.

Name: London Fog-b
Description: The green perfection for any party night is the London Fog - a delightful cocktail.

Name: London Mule
Description: A London Mule with gin and lime and ginger beer is just right for a sunny afternoon. Enjoy the recipe in a cozy gathering.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea
Description: Long Island Iced Tea the original fits for a mega party. The recipe sets the mood and is totally easy to prepare.

Name: Mai Tai
Description: The classic rum cocktail from sunny California is the Mai Tai - a recipe for everyone who loves brown rum.

Name: Malibu Sea Breeze
Description: Malibu Beach is a cocktail that will put you in a vacation mood just by its name - simply delicious.

Name: Manhattan
Description: An easy recipe for a Manhattan — a classic cocktail that is believed to date back to the late 1800s. It's made with a bracing mixture of bourbon or rye whiskey mixed with sweet vermouth and a dash of aromatic bitters.

Name: Margarita
Description: The Margarita is a classic cocktail. A tasty drink that looks great.

Name: Mexican Sunset-b
Description: Mexican Sunset is a cocktail that has a tart but delicious taste and looks great.

Name: Mimosa
Description: This hearty mimosa cocktail is a great drink. The recipe is easy to prepare and always goes well for a toast.

Name: Mojito
Description: The Mojito is a classic cocktail and a refreshing drink that always fits.

Name: Moscow Mule
Description: This delicious Moscow Mule with vodka, lime juice and ginger beer, is the new trend among cocktails and is popularly served in a copper mug.

Name: Negroni
Description: The famous Negroni cocktail is made with Campari, gin and Vermouth Rosso. This cocktail recipe tastes excellent.

Name: Old Fashioned
Description: The old fashioned is a classic cocktail that was invented in Louisville, KY. You can make it with bourbon, rye, or a blended whiskey. You can also substitute one sugar cube for the simple syrup.

Name: Optimist-d
Description: The Optimist is a delicious fruity cocktail that gets a great flavor from the liqueur.

Name: Paradise
Description: A tasty cocktail succeeds with this recipe. The Paradise not only looks great, it tastes great.

Name: Punch
Description: See how easy it is to make a delicious party punch with this 3-ingredient recipe. It's so simple, even a child can make it. We love this punch for family gatherings — my sisters, brother, and I even had it served at our weddings! Add sliced fruit if desired.

Name: Pina Colada
Description: Pineapple chunks make this pina colada a delight. A recipe dream for colada fans.

Name: Planter'S Punch
Description: Planters Punch is a fruity cocktail from the USA. It looks great and tastes terrific.

Name: Ritz-d
Description: A Spritzyer cocktail that doubles as an aperitif is the Ritz - tastes deliciously bubbly.

Name: Sangria-d
Description: This authentic sangria recipe is a terrific version of the popular wine drink. You can add any fruit that you want, but I find that apples and pears absorb all the rum. This one is not diluted with carbonated beverages. I have had much success with red Burgundy wine and white rum, though spiced rum is nice too.

Name: Screw Driver
Description: A great Screwdriver adds zest and taste. Enjoy the cocktail with friends. Here's the recipe.

Name: Sea Breeze
Description: Seabreeze is a super looking and insanely great tasting cocktail you should try.

Name: Sex On The Beach
Description: The Sex on the Beach cocktail is one of the most famous and popular drinks ever. Delightfully Fresh and Fruity.

Name: Sidecar
Description: This sidecar is prepared with brandy. Further enhanced with Cointreau and lemon juice. Here is the recipe.

Name: Singapore Sling
Description: The Singapore Sling is a Fruityer cocktail that is easy to prepare and tastes simply delicious.

Name: Strawberry Daiquir-d
Description: Fresh and Fruity tastes a Strawberry Daiquiri, ideal for summer and of course pool parties.

Name: Strawberry Margarita
Description: The Strawbeery Margherita is a classic cocktail that tastes Sweet and looks great.

Name: Sweet Memories-d
Description: Sweet Memories - a sinfully good cocktail guaranteed to give you Sweete moments.

Name: Swimming Pool-d
Description: The Swimming Pool not only looks terrific, it tastes great too. A delightful, summer cocktail.

Name: Tahiti-d
Description: A terrific cocktail that will put you in the vacation mood is the Tahiti - be sure to try it.

Name: Tequila Sunrise
Description: A classic cocktail is the Tequila Sunrise. It makes the taste buds explode.

Name: Tom Collins
Description: The Tom Collins is a tasty cocktail for which the Collins glass, a long long drink glass, was specially invented.

Name: Vesper
Description: The drink Vesper Martini is known from the James Bond movie and tastes terrific. Here is the recipe to shake it.

Name: Vodka Apple
Description: This Vodka Apple is just the thing for party fans with Apple Juice and an apple wedge, as the recipe brings bomb cheer.

Name: Gimlet
Description: A sour, tasty cocktail succeeds with this recipe - the Vodka Gimlet tastes just great.

Name: Vodka Martini
Description: A Vodka Martini is always welcome tastes terrific. The recipe makes for super great tasting moments and is reminiscent of James.

Name: Vodka Paralyzer-d
Description: Paralyzer cocktail made with cola, coffee, vodka, and milk. I have been told that my vodka paralyzers are the best. These are especially yummy topped with a cocktail cherrrry, but that is by no means necessary. Make sure you add the ingredients in the order listed, or else the milk may curdle.

Name: Vodka Sour
Description: The Vodka Sour cocktail is a must at any party. Mix with Ice and pour into a tumbler glass - ready.

Name: Volcano-d
Description: Vulcano is a tasty, spritzy cocktail that you are guaranteed to enjoy.

Name: Whiskey Cola
Description: A whiskey cola is a recipe for whiskey fans, topped up with cola a great drink. Enjoy the recipe in late hour.
Keywords: Cocktails and Punch Recipes for Christmas

Name: Whiskey Sour
Description: The Whiskey Sour is a classic cocktail and can also be served as an aperitif in a smart glass.

Name: White Lady
Description: Here's a recipe for a tasty cocktail. White Lady tastes erFreshend and is suitable for your parties.

Name: White Russian
Description: The famous Russian made with vodka, Kahlua & cream is the White Russian. A wonderfully creamy cocktail.

Name: Zombie
Description: The Zombie is a slightly stronger, very tasty cocktail. It is perfect for parties.
